column5: Hi, just want to congratulate you, i have BP2, OCD and GAD, your video inspires me a lot, curiously, i keep things outside my room pretty sharp, but my bedroom is the  reflection of how troubled i am, sometimes when i sit on my bed i feel like crying how out of order things look around, but this time ill take some courage to make everything look tidy as it should, thanks again for sharing this, best wishes ,all the best for you i think we can always get better  : )
